sentence: MARGARET BRENNAN: You heard there what is happening in Florida and what Governor Ron DeSantis describes.
title: Transcript: Former Attorney General Eric Holder on "Face the Nation," May 8, 2022

sentence: ED O'KEEFE: And in Florida, which also gained a House seat, Republican governor Ron DeSantis insisted state lawmakers draw a map that eliminated an historically black congressional district, stretching from Jacksonville to Tallahassee, potentially giving Republicans four more seats.
title: Full transcript of "Face the Nation" on May 8, 2022

sentence: And Burton argued that "the reason they are engaging in reckless gerrymandering in the 11th hour like ignoring court orders in Ohio and Ron DeSantis forcing a clearly unconstitutional map upon the people of Florida is because they failed to draw themselves into a congressional majority everywhere else.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Republicans claim victory in congressional redistricting fight
